item.title: Cracking open a cold run with the boys
item.author: Henry Maynard,
item.description: Last month, with the ‘mini-beast from the East’ spreading its frosty tendrils over the North Sea, the Met Office issued amber warnings for wind, ice, and snow across much of the UK. The same time, a detachment of hardy (foolish?) ICXCAC trail runners left London with their sights set on a very long …
